title: For idiots only
review: The only good idea of the film was *not* to spend money making it. Instead the bad idea consists in you (or anyone) wasting the money and the time watching a filmographich subproduct (can't be called film in the usual sense). Leave brain in the bucket if you plan to be scared by anything but by how stupid you were to end up with this. No direction, no acting, no storyboard, no knowledge, no coherence, no special effects, no nothing......
